servinfo.title: Headlight auto leveling indicator does not light up

condition.ptxt: Headlight auto leveling indicator does not light up

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.

ps.ptxt: Headlight auto leveling control module faulty

action.ptxt: Check headlight auto leveling control module referring to Inspection of Headlight Leveling Control Module and Its Circuit (Vehicle Equipped with Auto Leveling Headlight System) .
